body:
We aim to respond to you as soon as possible, but allow up to [x days].

We don't reply to messages that :

* contain offensive or abusive language or material
* are repeat enquiries
* sell or promote a product

We are not able to provide legal advice.

Write your message in English or Welsh.
heading: Contact the Court of Protection
lede: Use this service to send a message to the Court of Protection.
